title: Skin Concept: Gentleman Kayn
body: Gentleman Kayn (1820 Skin). Rhaast would be a talking walking-cane and Kayn would be a gentleman. Ideally there would be a new VO where instead of snide remarks they would have civil discourse.

replies.body:
Brilliant. Absolutely brilliant. 

Somehow, the first thing I thought of was this for Kayn's VO: https://www.buzzfeed.com/lukelewis/shakespearean-insults-to-use-in-everyday-life?utm_term=.kbbA2w5jW#.it6ewxOKQ
Somebody at Riot hire this man. Ingenious.
